TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_u_kamu_nu_Akate, title = u_kamu_nu_Akate, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_kamu_nu_Akate} }

S.FORM: == nilacul == 阿卡德語,u kamu nu Akate(Akate a kamu:𒀝𒅗𒁺𒌑,akkadû ；sulit:𒌵𒆠,URIKI ；acasa Akate a kamu:𒅴𒀝𒅗𒁲𒌈,lišānum akkadītum )), u zuma a ngangan sa, u Yajia a kamu acasa Yakati a kamu, u kamu i sumamaday i Meisoputamiya kakitizaan saungay, u Yafi kamu salaylay San a binacadan a kamu. u matinengay saayaway a kamu nu San a binacadan, Akate a kamu namakay sumamaday Sumei a kamu, Sye a sulit. kya kamu a ngangan namakay tusa talawadaw lalangawan. kakiliman BC 3000 a mihcaan, Sumei binacadan a tademaw atu Akate binacadan a tademaw patahkal tu masasiketay a lalangawan, tusa_kamu tacuwacuwa sa mueneng. micaliw tu sulit, kamu_sakilul, kakuniza atu kamu_ngiha macamel, Sumei a kamu salawilaw tu Akate a kamu. sisa, u kusuday pakuhica Sumei atu Akete tina tatusa a binacadan, u nisakaput kuheni. patalahekal ku Akate a kamu i BC 2800 a mihcaan, sungay tu cidek ngangan_sulit . namakay BC 3000 a mihcaan zikuzay a demiad, malingatu tahekal tatenga'ay nu Akate a kamu a sulit atu cudad. kayadah ku cudad atu nasulitan matepa, izaw ku kungku,hulic,kagak ,tigami atu laylay a cudad. katukuh BC 2000 a mihcaan, tusa masazumaay a kamu(u Yasu a kamu atu Papilun a kamu), nasaungay i Yasu atu Papilun. Akate a kamu na u saungayay a kamu i sumamaday a capi_wali kakitizaan, matenes katukuh kayadah a lasubu a mihcaan, alawhani, BC 800 a mihcaan, malawpes tu tina kamu, nikatapalan ni Alami a kamu. katukuh Sila a namihcaan , u mapalaway dada' musaungay tian kamu. sazikuzay a cudad tahekal i BC 100 a mihcaan. kakitizaan a kamu: i sasa'ay a sapat_sulit , u malucekay a kakitizaan a kamu nu Akate: u miginkiway pakuhica , i ayaway a nasakamuwan atu natingengan, saungayay a Akate a kamu, caykaw nu zikuzay a Yasu kakitizaan a kamu atu Papilun kakitizaan a kamu, u paliyuh atu malawpesay a pacacayay a kakitizaan a kamu. u zumaay a Akate a kamu sanay ku Aypola a kamu, uyzasa mizateng kita u pacacayay a wali_Sanmite a kamu ku Akate a kamu. edapngiha nangiha

== nilacol == 阿卡德語,o kamo no Akate(Akate a kamo:𒀝𒅗𒁺𒌑,akkadû ；solit:𒌵𒆠,URIKI ；acasa Akate a kamo:𒅴𒀝𒅗𒁲𒌈,lišānom akkadītom )), o zoma a ngangan sa, o Yajia a kamo acasa Yakati a kamo, o kamo i somamaday i Meisopotamiya kakitizaan saongay, o Yafi kamo salaylay San a binacadan a kamo. o matinengay saayaway a kamo no San a binacadan, Akate a kamo namakay somamaday Somei a kamo, Sye a solit. kya kamo a ngangan namakay tosa talawadaw lalangawan. kakiliman BC 3000 a mihcaan, Somei binacadan a tademaw ato Akate binacadan a tademaw patahkal to masasiketay a lalangawan, tosa_kamo tacowacowa sa moeneng. micaliw to solit, kamo_sakilol, kakoniza ato kamo_ngiha macamel, Somei a kamo salawilaw to Akate a kamo. sisa, o kosoday pakohica Somei ato Akete tina tatosa a binacadan, o nisakapot koheni. patalahekal ko Akate a kamo i BC 2800 a mihcaan, songay to cidek ngangan_solit . namakay BC 3000 a mihcaan zikozay a demiad, malingato tahekal tatenga'ay no Akate a kamo a solit ato codad. kayadah ko codad ato nasolitan matepa, izaw ko kongko,holic,kagak ,tigami ato laylay a codad. katokoh BC 2000 a mihcaan, tosa masazomaay a kamo(o Yaso a kamo ato Papilon a kamo), nasaongay i Yaso ato Papilon. Akate a kamo na o saongayay a kamo i somamaday a capi_wali kakitizaan, matenes katokoh kayadah a lasobo a mihcaan, alawhani, BC 800 a mihcaan, malawpes to tina kamo, nikatapalan ni Alami a kamo. katokoh Sila a namihcaan , o mapalaway dada' mosaongay tian kamo. sazikozay a codad tahekal i BC 100 a mihcaan. kakitizaan a kamo: i sasa'ay a sapat_solit , o malocekay a kakitizaan a kamo no Akate: o miginkiway pakohica , i ayaway a nasakamowan ato natingengan, saongayay a Akate a kamo, caykaw no zikozay a Yaso kakitizaan a kamo ato Papilon kakitizaan a kamo, o paliyoh ato malawpesay a pacacayay a kakitizaan a kamo. o zomaay a Akate a kamo sanay ko Aypola a kamo, oyzasa mizateng kita o pacacayay a wali_Sanmite a kamo ko Akate a kamo. edapngiha nangiha
